content.text: “Equity security” in Sections 181, 1001, 1113, 1200, and 1201 means any share or membership of a domestic or foreign corporation; any partnership interest, membership interest, or equivalent equity interest in an other business entity; and any security convertible with or without consideration into, or any warrant or right to subscribe to or purchase, any of the foregoing.

history: Amended by Stats. 1999, Ch. 437, Sec. 2. Effective January 1, 2000.
